alert.note: Alert for Lenawee; Monroe; Washtenaw (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 14 at 6:58PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Monroe, Lenawee and Washtenaw Counties through 800 PM EDT... At 658 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Chelsea to near Manchester to near Clayton. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Chelsea around 705 PM EDT. Dexter around 710 PM EDT. Tecumseh around 720 PM EDT. Ann Arbor, Saline and Whitmore Lake around 725 PM EDT. Britton around 730 PM EDT. Salem around 735 PM EDT. Ypsilanti, Dundee and Dixboro around 740 PM EDT. Milan around 745 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Whittaker, Ogden Center, Canandaigua, Hudson Mills Metropark, Ridgeway, Delhi Mills, Palmyra, Pleasant Lake, Sand Creek and Azalia. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
